other_tests.procedure_name: CT abdomen and pelvis with contrast

findings.abdominal findings: Fluid collection containing gas in the left flank, measuring approximately 6 x 2.5 x 3 cm, with substantial improvement in size.
findings.no small bowel obstruction: No small bowel dilatation to suggest an obstruction.
findings.lung findings: Consolidation/collapse in the right lower lobe and minimal right-sided pleural effusion.

other_tests.changes_over_time: The fluid collection in the left flank demonstrated substantial improvement in size.
